import React from 'react' import cl from './InputContainer.module.scss' import Input from '../../Input/Input' const InputContainer = ({ addNewCategory, inputValue, setInputValue }) => { const inputStyles = { padding: '7px 30px 7px 5px', fontSize: '14px', } return (
setInputValue(e.target.value)} />
) } export default InputContainer
